mapper.sql: select wc.*,writer,illustrator,publisher,dayofweek from webcontents wc,book where wc.contnum=book.contnum
select wc.*,director,actor,runtime,proddate from webcontents wc,video where wc.contnum=video.contnum
mapper.select: select genre from webcontents where cultype=#{cultype} group by genre
mapper.update: update webcontents set readernum=readernum+1 where contnum=#{contnum}
mapper.select: select wc.* from webcontents wc,book where wc.contnum=book.contnum and book.dayofweek=#{dayofweek} and cultype=1
select * from webcontents where cultype=#{cultype} order by readernum desc
select w.*,sq.tot from webcontents w,(select contnum,sum(e.hit) as tot from episode e group by contnum) sq where sq.contnum=w.contnum and w.cultype=#{cultype} order by tot desc

select sq4.contnum,count(dd) cnt from( select w.*,sq1.cc dd from (select e.*,sq2.bb cc from (select c.*,sq3.aa bb from (select l.*,l.type as aa from commlikes l where l.type=1) sq3,comments c where sq3.commnum=c.commnum) sq2,episode e where sq2.epinum=e.epinum) sq1,webcontents w where sq1.contnum=w.contnum and w.cultype=#{cultype} ) sq4 group by sq4.contnum order by cnt desc

select w.contnum,sum(sq1.ss)/count(sq1.ns) ts from (select e.*,s.score ss,s.scorenum ns from score s,episode e where s.epinum=e.epinum) sq1,webcontents w where sq1.contnum=w.contnum and w.cultype=#{cultype} group by w.contnum order by ts desc

select w.*,sq1.uploaddate from webcontents w, (select contnum,max(uploaddate) uploaddate from episode where to_char(uploaddate,'YY/mm/DD')=to_char(sysdate,'YY/mm/DD') group by contnum) sq1 where w.contnum=sq1.contnum
